briefdescription.para: Convert the wrapped string into a char based std::string.

detaileddescription.para:
This helper performs the required conversion from char8_t to char and is primarily meant for interoperability with APIs that expect a regular std::string.
A char based string.

briefdescription.para: Convert and verify UTF-8 data from a char based std:string.

parameterdescription.para: The string to convert and verify.
(Encoding) if the string contains UTF-8 encoding errors or invalid Unicode code-points.

memberdef.name: find

briefdescription.para: Find the first occurrence of a substring in the string.

parameterdescription.para: Type of the search string.
The substring to search for.
The starting position of the search.
The number of characters of the substring.

simplesect.para: The index of the first occurrence, or npos if not found.

briefdescription.para: This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. It differs from the above function only in what argument(s) it accepts.

memberdef.argsstring: (FindStr s, size_type pos, size_type count) const
memberdef.name: rfind

briefdescription.para: Find the last occurrence of a substring in the string.

parameterdescription.para: Type of the search string.
The substring to search for.
The starting position of the search.
The number of characters of the substring.

simplesect.para: The index of the last occurrence, or npos if not found.

briefdescription.para: This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. It differs from the above function only in what argument(s) it accepts.

memberdef.argsstring: (FindStr s, size_type pos, size_type count) const
memberdef.name: find_first_of

briefdescription.para: Find the first occurrence of any character from a set.

parameterdescription.para: Type of the search set string.
The set of characters to search for.
The starting position of the search.
The number of characters in the set.

simplesect.para: The index of the first matching character, or npos if not found.

briefdescription.para: This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. It differs from the above function only in what argument(s) it accepts.

memberdef.name: find_first_not_of

parameterdescription.para: Type of the search set string.
The set of characters to exclude.
The starting position of the search.
The number of characters in the set.

simplesect.para: The index of the first non-matching character, or npos if none.

briefdescription.para: This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. It differs from the above function only in what argument(s) it accepts.

briefdescription.para: This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. It differs from the above function only in what argument(s) it accepts.
Check if the string starts with a given prefix.

simplesect.para: This does a binary comparison to follow the original functionality of the std-library. For a Unicode code-point-based variant, please use startsWith.

parameterdescription.para: Type of the prefix string.
The prefix to check.

simplesect.para: true if the string starts with the prefix, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Check if the string ends with a given suffix.

simplesect.para: This does a binary comparison to follow the original functionality of the std-library. For a Unicode code-point-based variant, please use endsWith.

parameterdescription.para: Type of the suffix string.
The suffix to check.

simplesect.para: true if the string ends with the suffix, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Check if the string contains a given substring.

simplesect.para: This does a binary comparison to follow the original functionality of the std-library. To force the Unicode code-point-based variant, please use contains with String.

parameterdescription.para: Type of the search string.
The substring to search for.

simplesect.para: true if the substring is found, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Test if the contained UTF-8 data is valid.

detaileddescription.para:
Tests for out-of-range Unicode code-points and UTF-8 encoding errors.
true if the string contains valid UTF-8, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Get the number of Unicode code-points (characters).

detaileddescription.para:
Decodes the string and counts the characters.
The number of characters in this string.
Error
(Encoding) if the string contains invalid UTF-8 data.

briefdescription.para: Compare this string with another using Unicode code-points.

parameterdescription.para: The other string to compare with.
Controls whether the comparison is case-sensitive.

simplesect.para: The three-way comparison result.

parameterdescription.para: (Encoding) if either string contains invalid UTF-8 data.

briefdescription.para: Compare this string with another using name normalization Example: "this_name" == "THIS_NAME" == "This Name".

parameterdescription.para: The other string to compare with.

simplesect.para: The three-way comparison result.

parameterdescription.para: (Encoding) if either string contains invalid UTF-8 data.

briefdescription.para: Test if this string starts with another string using Unicode code-points.

parameterdescription.para: The other string for the comparison.
Controls case sensitivity.

simplesect.para: true if this string starts with other.

parameterdescription.para: (Encoding) if either string contains invalid UTF-8 data.

briefdescription.para: Test if this string contains another string using Unicode code-points.

parameterdescription.para: The substring to search for.
Controls case sensitivity.

simplesect.para: true if this string contains other as a contiguous subsequence.

parameterdescription.para: (Encoding) if either string contains invalid UTF-8 data.

briefdescription.para: Test if this string ends with another string using Unicode code-points.

parameterdescription.para: The other string for the comparison.
Controls case sensitivity.

simplesect.para: true if this string ends with other.

parameterdescription.para: (Encoding) if either string contains invalid UTF-8 data.

briefdescription.para: Split this string at a character using Unicode code-points.

detaileddescription.para:
Empty segments are included in the result. If maxSplits is set, at most that many splits are performed, and the remaining text is returned as the final segment.
character
The separator character to split at.
maxSplits
Optional maximum number of splits.
The list of split segments.
Error
(Encoding) if the string contains invalid UTF-8 data.

briefdescription.para: Join string parts using this string as the glue.

parameterdescription.para: The parts to join.

simplesect.para: The joined string.

briefdescription.para: Transform this string by applying a function to each decoded character.

parameterdescription.para: A function that transforms one character into another.

simplesect.para: A new string with all characters transformed.

parameterdescription.para: (Encoding) if the string contains invalid UTF-8 data.

briefdescription.para: Call a function for each decoded character.

parameterdescription.para: The function to call for each decoded character.
(Encoding) if the string contains invalid UTF-8 data.

briefdescription.para: Convert text to be safe for output or logs.

detaileddescription.para:
Escapes characters that may disrupt display or have side effects and truncates to the given number of characters, inserting an ellipsis in the middle when necessary.
maximumSize
The maximum number of characters (default 200).
The safe text.

briefdescription.para: Get the byte size of the escaped string.

detaileddescription.para:
Use this function to calculate the size requirements of an escaped string, without the actual conversion.
The byte size of the escaped text (without trailing zero end byte).

briefdescription.para: Create an escaped version of this string.

parameterdescription.para: The escape mode to use for escaping.

briefdescription.para: Thin wrapper around std::u8string.

detaileddescription.para: The class mirrors the API of std::u8string closely and adds a few convenience functions. It is primarily intended to ease the integration of the parser into applications that use std::string for text processing.

simplesect.title: Tested:
simplesect.para: StringTest, StringUtf8Test
